Description: Duties and responsibilities shall include, but not limited to, the following:1. Delivering excellent customer service at all times;2. Welcoming visitors / guests, in person or on the telephone;3. Answering / forwarding / referring inquiries and phone calls;4. Directing visitors by maintaining employee and department directories;5. Maintaining a safe and clean reception area by complying with procedures, rules and regulations;6. Booking meetings and arranging couriers;7. Contributing to team effort by accomplising related results, as needed;8. Performing other related functions from time to time as directed by management.Skills
Skills: - With work experience in the same field
- Well-organized and with excellent customer service skills
